Austria Transition Tracker (BETA v0.0.1)

About

Motivation

This site is a purely private project, created out of interest in the sustainable transition and enthusiasm to monitor it as best as possible with publicly available data. Please note that no guarantee on data accuracy is given. Any feedback, constructive criticism, or direct contributions are very welcome and greatly appreciated!

Data sources

Whenever possible, the site uses data that can be retrieved automatically via API-requests. Most important data sources are:

Source Example data sets Call
Eurostat Energy balances, various monthly and yearly statistics Automatic via API
Statistics Austria Car registrations, installed heating systems, â€¦ Manual downloads
Umweltbundesamt: National Inventory Report GHG emission data of sub-sectors Manual downloads
Umweltbundesamt: Klimadashboard GHG emission data of sectors Manual downloads

Stack

The github page frontend was created using jekyll. The backend uses python, including sourcing and processing of all data, and chart generation. Charts are created with plotly. To view the source code as well as instructions how to set up the page locally please visit the Github source page.

Privacy

This page is hosted as a GitHub Pages website. GitHub may collect some user informations such as IP addresses upon visit of this website. For details see the explanation on GitHub pages and the there linked general Privacy Statement of GitHub. Besides data collected directly via GitHub, this page does not track any other data and does not collect any cookies.
